segment.source: Use the walkthroughs in this section to learn how to add banner ads and video interstitial ads to apps by using the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: The walkthroughs in this section show you how to add banner ads and video interstitial ads to apps by using the Microsoft advertising libraries.
segment.target: The walkthroughs in this section show you how to add banner ads and video interstitial ads to apps by using the Microsoft advertising libraries.

segment.source: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.
segment.target: For complete sample projects that demonstrate how to add banner and video interstitial ads to JavaScript/HTML apps and XAML apps using C# and C++, see the advertising samples on GitHub.

segment.source: Show a video interstitial ads in your app.
segment.target: Show a video interstitial ads in your app.

segment.source: Add a banner ad in your XAML/.NET app.
segment.target: Add a banner ad in your XAML/.NET app.

segment.source: Add a banner ad in your HTML5/JavaScript app.
segment.target: Add a banner ad in your HTML5/JavaScript app.

segment.source: Add a banner ad in your Windows Phone 8.x Silverlight app.
segment.target: Add a banner ad in your Windows Phone 8.x Silverlight app.
